attributes.action: make Spike Milligan honorary God in deference to his brilliance as a writer, broadcaster and downright good geezer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any man who has "Told you I was ill" on his tombstone, deserves to be God - that's God, not a god.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
